alert.note: Alert for Van Buren (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued September 25 at 9:14PM EDT until September 25 at 10:15PM EDT by NWS Grand Rapids
info.description: The National Weather Service in Grand Rapids has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Van Buren County in southwestern Michigan... * Until 1015 PM EDT. * At 914 PM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 8 miles west of Holland SP to 7 miles northwest of South Haven to 12 miles northwest of St. Joseph, moving southeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... South Haven... Paw Paw... Hartford... Mattawan... Lawton... Bangor... Decatur... Van Buren SP... Lake Michigan Beach... Pine Grove... Covert... Keeler... Lawrence... Gobles... Bloomingdale... Breedsville... Glendale... Grand Junction... Kendall... South Haven Area Reg... HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
